name: Baseball (itch)
description: An easy game of baseball using one or two players who choose teams. The balls, strikes, foul balls, walks, hits, errors, stolen bases, and outs are called by a play-by-play announcer making this nine innings of baseball fun. You are the batter and you have the choice to have the umpire call a ball or strike, or you can swing at the pitch. There are realistic sounds of baseball including the sound of the bat hitting the ball, the crowds cheering, and the stadium organ playing.
